description:
Blitz - One Button Accessible Game

Welcome to my corner of the internet.

On my site I create games that can be played with a single input device, allowing my games to accessible to everyone.

All games can be played using just the left-mouse-button or spacebar; no mouse movement required.

I have set up games to play with just the left mouse button, or any other input device directly or via a switch unit that can 'register' a left mouse click or spacebar.
